text: Club Baloncesto Breogán is a galician basketball team. It was founded in 1966. The team currently plays in league ACB, but in the past the team participated in European competitions. == Major Trophies == * LEB Oro (LEB Gold) : 3 (Record) ** 1998/99, 2017/18, 2020/21 * Prince's Cup of Basketball: 3 (Record) ** 2007/08, 2017/18, 2020/21 * Copa Galicia de Baloncesto (Galician League): 14 (Record) ** 1986, 1987, 1998, 2000, 2002, 2003, 2004, 2005, 2007, 2008, 2009, 2018, 2021, 2022 == Current Squad == This is the 2010-11 Breogán's squad.Breogán Squad * 4. James Feldeine (6 ft 4 in) * 5. Eric Hayes (6 ft 4 in) * 6. Jordi Vallmajó (6 ft 3 in) * 7. Camilo Riveiro (6 ft 6.5 in) * 8. Arnette Hallman (6 ft 6 in) * 9. Cliff Brown (6 ft 7 in) * 10. Brandon Polk (6 ft 7 in) * 12. Óliver Arteaga (6 ft 10.3 in) * 13. Xavi Forcada (6 ft 4.7 in) * 14. José Amador (6 ft 11 in) * 15. Betinho (6 ft 6.2 in) * President: ** Jesús Lázare * Head coach: ** Natxo Lezkano == Famous Players == * Santi Abad * Jeff Adrien * José Miguel Antúnez * Charlie Bell * Tanoka Beard * Anthony Bonner * Devin Davis * James Donaldson * Greg Foster * Nikola Lončar * Pete Mickeal * Velimir Perasović * Manel Sánchez == Famous Coaches == * Andreu Casadevall * Moncho López == References == Category:Basketball teams in Spain Category:Province of Lugo
title: CB Breogán
